function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Suspension of projects due to contagious virus","Impact":"Labour impact, job loss, financial and safety concerns for workers","Mitigation":"Implementing strict social distancing measures, providing financial support for workers, and ensuring workplace safety protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, remote work technology, and virtual communication tools","People":"Construction workers, subcontractors, and project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, government authorities, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Time overrun due to pandemic control period","Impact":"Extended project timelines, delays in project completion, and increased project costs","Mitigation":"Efficient pandemic control measures, flexible project timelines, and proactive project planning","Technologies":"Remote monitoring technology, project management software, and pandemic risk assessment tools","People":"Project managers, construction workers, and project stakeholders","Owner":"Project management teams, construction companies, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Financial impact due to economic deterioration and project suspensions","Impact":"Increased project costs, financial strain on subcontractors, and salary obligations for non-progressing work","Mitigation":"Financial assistance for subcontractors, cost-effective project management strategies, and economic recovery initiatives","Technologies":"Predictive analytics tools, financial management software, and remote financial support systems","People":"Subcontractors, contractors, and project finance managers","Owner":"Government authorities, project finance committees, and construction industry associations"}]}
